instruction: rotate right about-face, then back up for a long while, after that move ahead a lot
veer right a lot, after that um move back for a long while, after that kind of back up just a little.
First, rotate left about a right angle.
First, make a bark sound. Then, rotate right a bit.
okay move ahead slightly, then please reverse a tiny bit, then kind of turn left a lot
carefully rotate left a lot, next advance some distance, and then kind of rotate right slightly, next veer left a bit
First, rotate left a tiny bit.
okay rotate left about a right angle, after that um let out a bark, then okay move back a tiny bit, next um move ahead a bit.
First, veer right about-face. Then, bark. After that, turn right a tiny bit. Next, move back a bit.
First, back up for a while. Then, bark. After that, rotate left a lot. Next, rotate right about a quarter turn.
please veer right a bit
carefully move back a tiny bit, after that okay let out a bark.
First, make a bark sound. Then, bark. After that, veer right about a right angle.
First, turn left about a right angle.
let out a bark, then um reverse a tiny bit
please move back a lot.
First, veer right a bit. Then, go forward for a while. After that, rotate right about a quarter turn.
First, go backward a tiny bit. Then, reverse for a long while.
First, rotate right a lot. Then, move back a tiny bit. After that, let out a bark.
um veer right slightly, then please turn right about-face, after that please move ahead for a long while
First, move ahead just a little.
um veer right a lot, and then veer left a bit, next okay veer right a tiny bit.
First, veer left slightly. Then, advance a bit. After that, advance just a little. Next, rotate right about a quarter turn.
kind of go forward slightly, then okay veer right slightly.
kind of move forward a bit, next kind of move forward for a long while, after that kind of rotate right slightly.
First, back up for a long while.
kind of advance for a while.
First, move ahead slightly. Then, veer left a bit. After that, go backward for a long while.
turn left about-face, then kind of turn left a lot.
First, go backward some distance. Then, move back a tiny bit.
carefully rotate right about a right angle, and then bark.
First, rotate right a lot. Then, bark. After that, turn right about a right angle.
